name: tsdk
description: Type-safe API development and code share tool for TypeScript projects.

scripts.start: npm run test && pnpm --filter server-example sync && pnpm --filter server-example build && pnpm --filter server-example example
scripts.start-publish: node ../../scripts/purge-pkg-for-publish.mjs && npm run build && npm publish --access public --no-git-checks --provenance --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.start-website: cd website && yarn && npm run start
scripts.build-website: cd website && yarn && npm run build
